modifier.infinity_catalyst.name: Infinity
modifier.blinding.name: Blinding
modifier.bloodthirst.name: Bloodthirst
modifier.bloodthirst.desc: §oSlurp.§r\nYour tool loves blood, when you take damage, it will absorb your blood to repair itself.
modifier.cosmic.name: Cosmic
modifier.cosmic.desc: §oFrom the limitless reaches of space.§r\nExtra modifiers, instakill and fortune X.
modifier.crystalline.name: Crystalline
modifier.crystalline.desc: §oNot just pretty.§r\nIncreases mining speed and attack damage.
modifier.depthdigger.name: Depth Digger
modifier.depthdigger.desc: §oDig deep.§r\nIncreases mining speed the lower you are below sea level.
modifier.fancy.name: Fancy
modifier.fancy.desc: §oExpensive and shiny.§r\nDoesn't do anything special, just looks cool.
modifier.intangible.name: Intangible
modifier.intangible.desc: §oLike a wisp of smoke.§r\nOccasionally deals extra damage that goes right through armor.
modifier.limited.name: Limited
modifier.limited.desc: §oLIMITED POWER§r\nDecreases attack damage and mining speed.
modifier.phasing.name: Phasing
modifier.short_fuse.name: Short Fuse
modifier.short_fuse.desc: §oExplosive personality.§r\nAttacking or mining sometimes causes a small explosion.
modifier.supermassive.name: Supermassive
modifier.unbreakable.name: Unbreakable
modifier.unbreakable.desc: §oCan't break this.§r\nPrevents the tool from taking damage.
modifier.unlimited.name: Unlimited
modifier.unlimited.desc: §oUNLIMITED POWER§r\nNegates the effect of the limited trait.
modifier.blinding_armor.name: modifier.blinding.name
modifier.cosmic_armor.name: modifier.cosmic.name
modifier.cosmic_armor.desc: §oFrom the limitless reaches of space.§r\nExtra modifiers and invincibility.
modifier.crystalline_armor.name: modifier.crystalline.name
modifier.fireproof_armor.name: Fireproof
modifier.fireproof_armor.desc: §oFrom the depths of hell.§r\nProvides protection from fire damage and your armor doesn't take damage from fire damage.
modifier.intangible_armor.name: modifier.intangible.name
modifier.intangible_armor.desc: §oLike a wisp of smoke.§r\nProjectiles sometimes go right through you.
modifier.limited_armor.name: modifier.limited.name
modifier.renewable_energy_armor.name: Renewable Energy
modifier.renewable_energy_armor.desc: §oWaste not, want not.§r\nWhen you take damage, your blood occasionally drops as coagulated blood.
modifier.short_fuse_armor.name: modifier.short_fuse.name
modifier.short_fuse_armor.desc: §oExplosive personality.§r\nBeing attacked sometimes causes a small explosion.
modifier.supermassive_armor.name: modifier.supermassive.name
modifier.supermassive_armor.desc: §oAn immovable object.§r\nMakes you immune to knockback.
modifier.unbreakable_armor.name: modifier.unbreakable.name
modifier.unbreakable_armor.desc: §oCan't break this.§r\nPrevents the armor from taking damage.
modifier.untamed_armor.name: Untamed
